mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard (WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, writeDate, category) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE(), #{category} )
mapper.select: SELECT f.*, m.name writerName, (SELECT COUNT(commentNo) FROM fbcomment WHERE boardNo = f.boardNo) commentNum FROM freeboard f INNER JOIN member m on f.writer = m.memberId ORDER BY boardNo DESC LIMIT #{startNo}, #{numOfPage}
SELECT COUNT(boardNo) FROM freeboard WHERE (title LIKE #{keyword} OR content LIKE #{keyword})
SELECT COUNT(boardNo) FROM freeboard WHERE category = #{viewCategory} AND (title LIKE #{keyword} OR content LIKE #{keyword})
